overview: The stooges run a tailor shop and need money to pay their creditors. A bank robber leaves his coat in the shop with a combination to a safe. When the crook comes back to retrieve the coat, the stooges capture him and get his bankroll.
tagline: The Stooges hunt for bank robber "Slippery Fingers" Hargen.
title: Rip, Sew and Stitch
